short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a better overview of your receipts and purchased items

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Login to Partnerkaart's self-service (https://www.partnerkaart.ee/iseteenindus/minu-tehingud) and get a better overview of your purchased items and receipts by running the extension.
